statements: UPDATE unauthorized_access_logs SET action='Login Failed', ip_address='192.168.1.10' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE unauthorized_access_attempts SET username='John Doe', ip_address='192.168.1.10' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE unauthorized_access_attempts SET ip_address='127.0.0.1', attempt_time=NOW() WHERE id=101
UPDATE trigger_logs SET details='Trigger executed successfully.', action_type='UPDATE', log_time=NOW() WHERE trigger_table='unauthorized_access_attempts'
UPDATE UnauthorizedAccessLogs SET username='john_doe' WHERE log_id=1001;
UPDATE FailedLoginAttempts SET ip_address='192.168.1.10', timestamp='2022-01-20 14:30:00' WHERE attempt_id=2002;

UPDATE access_log SET event_type = 'Login', timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE log_id = 10;

UPDATE Trigger_status SET last_checked=NOW(), status='Active' WHERE trigger_id=1;
UPDATE Unauthorized_access_attempts SET username = 'user1', access_type = 'login' WHERE attempt_time < '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE Trigger_logs SET log_message = 'Trigger fired successfully', log_time = '2021-07-15 09:30:00' WHERE trigger_id = 1;
